root.update_contents: <FlowDocument FontFamily="Microsoft YaHei UI" FontSize="14" LineHeight="14" PagePadding="5,0,5,0" AllowDrop="False" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"><Paragraph LineHeight="11.666666666666668"><Run FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="20" Background="#FFFF8000" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User" xml:space="preserve"> 更 新 日 志 </Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="9.333333333333334"><Run FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="16" Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">【更新】</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="8.166666666666668"><Run Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">1. 降级.NET框架至8.0，自包含.NET运行框架，无需额外下载。</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="8.166666666666668"><Run Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">2. 添加 从Xaml文件导入提示内容 的功能。</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="8.166666666666668"><Run Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">3. 让Prompt窗口不在alt+tab中显示。</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="8.166666666666668"><Run Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">4. 恢复默认设置时自动删除自启动注册表项并重启软件。</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="8.166666666666668"><Run Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">5. 添加SourceForge作为第二更新源。</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="9.333333333333334" LineStackingStrategy="MaxHeight"><Run FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="16" Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">【修复】</Run></Paragraph><Paragraph LineHeight="8.166666666666668"><Run Background="#00FFFFFF" xml:lang="zh-cn" NumberSubstitution.CultureSource="User">1. 自定义控件ColorSelector宽高设置失效的问题。</Run></Paragraph></FlowDocument>
